items.sentence: If Tom had a lot of money, he\'d buy that for you.
I\'m going to the supermarket to do some shopping.
You\'re the only one who knows what we have to do.
The meat they fed us tasted a little like chicken.
The moment I saw him, I knew he was angry with me.
The monthly staff meeting is never held on Monday.
I wish I could speak French as fluently as you do.
I wish that Tom would help Mary with her homework.
Tom doesn\'t pay much attention to how he dresses.
Tom came to Boston when he was thirteen years old.
